languages.text: "Инцендия, покайся. Ты впала в грех и превратилась в монстра!"
"Repent, Incendia. You have strayed from the path of righteousness and turned into a monster!"
languages.original_text: "Инцендия, покайся. Ты впала в грех и превратилась в монстра!"

traits.locale_text: "Repent, Incendia. You have lapsed into sin and turned into a monster!"
"Repent, Incendia. You have lapsed into sin and turned into a monster!"
"Repent, Incendia. You have lapsed into transgression and turned into a monster!"
"Repent, Incendia. You have lapsed into transgression and turned into a monster!"
"Repent, Incendia. You have strayed from the path of righteousness and turned into a monster!"
"Repent, Incendia. You have strayed from the path of righteousness and turned into a monster!"

languages.text: “忏悔吧，因森迪亚。你背弃了正义的道路，堕落成了嗜血的怪物！”
languages.original_text: "Repent, Incendia. You have strayed from the path of righteousness and turned into a monster!"

traits.locale_text: “忏悔吧，因森迪亚。你犯下了罪行，堕落成了嗜血的怪物！”

languages.text: 「悔い改めろ、インセンディア。お前は正しい道から外れ、怪物になったのだ！」
languages.original_text: "Repent, Incendia. You have strayed from the path of righteousness and turned into a monster!"

traits.locale_text: 「悔い改めろ、インセンディア。お前は正しい道から外れ、怪物になったのだ！」

languages.text: «Arrepiéntase, Incendia. ¡Se ha alejado del camino de la rectitud y se ha convertido en un monstruo!».
languages.original_text: "Repent, Incendia. You have strayed from the path of righteousness and turned into a monster!"

traits.locale_text: «Arrepiéntase, Incendia. ¡Ha caído en la transgresión y se ha convertido en un monstruo!».

languages.text: "Bereut, Incendia. Ihr seid vom Weg der Rechtschaffenheit abgekommen und habt Euch in ein Monster verwandelt!"
languages.original_text: "Repent, Incendia. You have strayed from the path of righteousness and turned into a monster!"

traits.locale_text: "Bereut, Incendia. Ihr seid vom Weg abgekommen, habt gesündigt und seid zu einem Monster geworden!"

languages.text: « Repentez-vous, Incendia. Vous vous êtes écartée du droit chemin et vous êtes devenue un monstre ! »
languages.original_text: "Repent, Incendia. You have strayed from the path of righteousness and turned into a monster!"

traits.locale_text: « Repentez-vous, Incendia. Vos transgressions sont allées trop loin, au point de faire de vous un véritable monstre ! »

languages.text: "Tövbe et İncendia. Doğruluk yolundan ayrılıp bir canavara dönüştün!"
languages.original_text: "Repent, Incendia. You have strayed from the path of righteousness and turned into a monster!"

traits.locale_text: "Tövbe et İncendia. Doğruluk yolundan ayrıldın ve bir canavara dönüştün!"
